system

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.Config

  • public abstract class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the configuration for the build of the program. As of now this includes: - The program's name - The default separator characters - The default ignored characters
    Author:
    twtduck

      • setDefaultLists

        public static void setDefaultLists(java.lang.String fileArg)
        Sets the separatorChars and ignoredChars lists with a preset. Default separators: "-", ".", " ", "_" Default ignored: "(", ")"
